data.name: ThreeDots: AI-Empowered Virtual Assistant for the Visually Impaired
data.description: ThreeDots is an AI-empowered virtual assistant for the visually impaired, providing an affordable and versatile solution through innovative hardware design, software development, and an SDK for interactive learning experiences.

data.name: Unlocking Bayesian Machine Learning with Normalizing Flows
data.description: Tapping into the potential of Bayesian machine learning, I extended a novel module that successfully applies Normalizing Flows to optimize Variational Inference, excelling in MNIST and CIFAR datasets.

data.name: Library Managment System
data.description: In high school, I developed an early web project called Library Management System, which streamlined library resource management with a user-friendly interface, allowing CRUD operations, member registration, and dynamic content loading using PHP, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and MySQL.
